{docbook}
<abstract>
 <para>This chapter supplies you with the basic knowledge of overridden components and REST APIs implemented in Collaboration via the following topics:</para>
    <itemizedlist>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CSref.ExtensionPoints">Extension points</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Knowledge of some overridable components in Collaboration, including ContentDAO, ContactLifeCycle, Transport, and EventLifeCycle.</para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CSref.PublicREST_APIs">Public REST APIs</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Details (such as name, service URL, service URL endpoint, location, parameter, and description) of Public REST APIs used in the Collaboration applications. </para>
      </listitem>
      <listitem>
        <para>
          <emphasis role="bold">
            <link linkend="CSref.JCRStructure">JCR Structure</link>
          </emphasis> </para>
          <para>Description of the JCR structure of the main applications in Collaboration.</para>
      </listitem>
    </itemizedlist>
	</abstract>
{docbook}
